short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that shows the Sikh Mul Mantar on every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension shows the Mul Mantar on every new tab. The Mul Mantar is opening of the Japji Sahib, the holy book of the Sikhs. 

When you open a new tab, the Mul Mantar is displayed in Gurmukhi, transliterated in English, and with the English translation. You also have an option to listen to the recitation of the Mul Mantar and the first paurees (stanza) of the Japji Sahib.
